org.netbeans.core.network.proxy.pac

Class PacScriptEvaluatorNoProxy

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.netbeans.core.network.proxy.pac.PacScriptEvaluatorNoProxy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PacScriptEvaluator

    public class PacScriptEvaluatorNoProxy
extends Object
implements PacScriptEvaluator
    PAC Script Evaluator which can be used as a last resort. Always returns NO_PROXY.

    • Method Detail

      • findProxyForURL

        public List<Proxy> findProxyForURL(URI u)
        Description copied from interface: PacScriptEvaluator
        Returns the proxy/proxies appropriate to use for the given URI.

        The method calls the JavaScript FindProxyForURL(url, host) function in the PAC script (or alternatively the FindProxyForURLEx(url, host) function), parses the result and returns it as a prioritized list of proxies.

        Specified by:
        findProxyForURL in interface PacScriptEvaluator
        Parameters:
        u - URI to get proxies for.
        Returns:

      • usesCaching

        public boolean usesCaching()
        Description copied from interface: PacScriptEvaluator
        Returns if the Evaluator uses result caching or not. Result caching speeds up execution as a call to Java method PacScriptEvaluator.findProxyForURL(java.net.URI) will not result in a call to JavaScript function FindProxyForURL if the URL has been resolved previously. But the Evaluator cannot use caching if the PAC Script uses methods which depends on time and the Evaluator may therefore have decided to turn off result caching.

        If an implementation of PacScriptEvaluator never uses result caching (because it simply isn't implemented) then this method will always return false.

        Specified by:
        usesCaching in interface PacScriptEvaluator
        Returns:
